channel.title: Personal on Adelina's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Adelina's Blog

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey there! My name is Adelina, but amongst my friends, I am often called one of the many nicknames I have. Just to give you a sense of what I mean by many, my nicknames include Adel, Adol, Addition, Adelania, Addy, Adellybean, Adelamaâ€”the list goes on. My interests range from Computer Science to Business to Dance, and recently, I’ve found a growing interest in Physics. As most of my friends know, I enjoy reading non-fiction books.
